processingCommand.script:
:IF &MACHINE_FUNCTION# = "WMS"
:  IF &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# <> "EMPTY"
:    SET &SR# = STR_FIND(&WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#, ":")
:    SET &SR# = &SR# - 1
:    SET &PROT# = SUBSTR(&WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#, 1, &SR#)

:    IF &PROT# = "http"
:      SET &M_CERTIFICATE_PASSWORD# = "EMPTY"
:    ENDIF

:    IF &M_CERTIFICATE_PASSWORD# = "null" OR ""
:      SET &M_CERTIFICATE_PASSWORD# = "EMPTY"
:    ENDIF
:  ELSE
:    SET &M_CERTIFICATE_PASSWORD# = "EMPTY"
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:IF &MACHINE_FUNCTION# = "REFS"
:  IF &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# <> "EMPTY"
:    SET &SR# = STR_FIND(&REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#, ":")
:    SET &SR# = &SR# - 1
:    SET &PROT# = SUBSTR(&REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#, 1, &SR#)

:    IF &PROT# = "http"
:      SET &M_CERTIFICATE_PASSWORD# = "EMPTY"
:    ENDIF

:    IF &M_CERTIFICATE_PASSWORD# = "null" OR ""
:      SET &M_CERTIFICATE_PASSWORD# = "EMPTY"
:    ENDIF
:  ELSE
:    SET &M_CERTIFICATE_PASSWORD# = "EMPTY"
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:ENDIF

:PUBLISH &M_CERTIFICATE_PASSWORD#,,WORKFLOW
